metadata.title: CVE-2023-41913 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: strongSwan before 5.9.12 has a buffer overflow and possible unauthenticatedremote code execution via a DH public value that exceeds the internalbuffer in charon-tkm's DH proxy. The earliest affected version is 5.3.0. Anattack can occur via a crafted IKE_SA_INIT message.

criterions.comment: strongswan: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
